name: color-property-utils
description: Components to control color using property interfaces.
author: larrykirschner@gmail.com

scripts.install:test: npm pack && cp ${npm_package_name}-${npm_package_version}.tgz ${npm_package_name}-latest.tgz && cd test && npm run clean && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -f *.tgz package-lock.json && cd test && npm run clean
scripts.pub:tag: git add -A && git commit -m ${npm_package_version} && git tag -a ${npm_package_version} -m ${npm_package_version} && git push origin master && git push origin ${npm_package_version}
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run clean
